title: “Pitch Perfect 3” stars channel their inner “Beauty and the Beast” behind-the-scenes, and totally nail it
text:
“Pitch Perfect 3” stars channel their inner “Beauty and the Beast” behind-the-scenes, and totally nail it We cannot get enough of t hese Pitch Perfect 3 set videos ! Most recently, Anna Camp and Brittany Snow channeled their inner Beauty and the Beast , and it was glorious.
Clearly, when the ladies of Pitch Perfect are on set, they can’t help but have a good time. On Monday, Camp proved this by sharing a hilarious video.
In the video Camp, who plays Aubrey , and Snow, who plays Chloe, got into the Disney spirit. In fact, they portrayed characters from Beauty and the Beast .
Sounds awesome, right? The short answer: yes. “Overly caffeinated Belle and the dashing Baker” #pitchperfect3style #nightshoot #gettinpunchy @brittsnowhuh,” Camp captioned the video. "Overly caffeinated Belle and the dashing Baker" #pitchperfect3 style #nightshoot #gettinpunchy @brittsnowhuh @esterdean 
A post shared by Anna Camp (@therealannacamp) on Mar 20, 2017 at 1:30pm PDT 
Yes, that is Camp channeling her inner Belle…and totally nailing it. Our favorite part, however, is Snow’s brief line as The Baker. “Good morning, Belle,” she says in a deep man’s voice.
These two are so fun together, we just can’t get enough.
Both of the actresses also showed off their sassy, and sexy, costumes from set the same day.
“The most fun I’ve had in a plane ✈️ #pitchperfect3,” Camp captioned her photo.
The most fun I've had in a plane ✈️ #pitchperfect3 
A post shared by Anna Camp (@therealannacamp) on Mar 20, 2017 at 1:44am PDT 
Seriously, could these ladies be any cuter? We know more than this picture makes it seem. #pitchperfect3 
A post shared by Brittany Snow (@brittsnowhuh) on Mar 20, 2017 at 6:56pm PDT 
“What the heck is happening in #pitchperfect3,” Snow wrote alongside a solo shot. What the heck is happening in these photos? Can we please come for a set visit?
What the heck is happening in #pitchperfect3 
A post shared by Brittany Snow (@brittsnowhuh) on Mar 20, 2017 at 6:43pm PDT 
What we do know is that we’re getting major retro vibes from these looks.
Oh, and if these pics don’t help with your Pitch Perfect fix, there’s so much more.
In fact, these two aren’t the only Barden Bellas who have gone a little wild during night shoots. On Monday, Anna Kendrick also shared a funny video at 5 a.m. of herself rapping. It’s so good, and will definitely make you laugh.
I get to go home soon.... they keep promising if I'm very good...#nightshoots 
A post shared by Anna Kendrick (@annakendrick47) on Mar 20, 2017 at 2:17am PDT 
Okay, it’s official, we need Pitch Perfect 3 to come out like right now!
